## üìù Table of Contents

- [About](#about)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Authors](#authors)

## üßê About <a name = "about"></a>

A simple YouTube video downloader for audio and video formats.

### Installing


```sh
yarn add @dark-yasiya/yt-dl.js
```

or

```sh
npm i @dark-yasiya/yt-dl.js
```

## üçü Usage <a name="usage"></a>

```ts
const { ytsearch, ytmp3, ytmp4 } = require('@dark-yasiya/yt-dl.js')
```


## Yt Search

```ts
const text = "lelena";
const result = ytsearch(text);
console.log(result);
```

## Download Ytmp3
```ts
const yturl = "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vOv2i88NmA4";
const result = ytmp3(yturl);
console.log(result);
```
```ts
{
  status: true,
  creator: '@DarkYasiya',
  result: {
    type: 'video',
    videoId: 'vOv2i88NmA4',
    url: 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=vOv2i88NmA4',
    title: 'Age Sinahawa Thahanam | ‡∂á‡∂ú‡∑ô ‡∑É‡∑í‡∂±‡∑Ñ‡∑Ä ‡∂≠‡∑Ñ‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä | Vini Productions - ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ì',

    timestamp: '25:41',
    duration: {
      toString: [Function: toString],

    views: 2003354,

      name: 'Vini Productions - ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ì',

  },
  download: {
    url: 'https://dl187.filemate11.shop/?%3D%3D',
    size: '23.52 MB'
  }
}
```

## Download Ytmp4

```ts
const yturl = "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vOv2i88NmA4";
const quality = "360p";
const result = ytmp4(yturl, quality);
console.log(result);
```
```ts
{

  creator: '@DarkYasiya',
```
